function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social support for at-risk and vulnerable groups","Impact":"Increased vulnerability and risk of contagion for at-risk and vulnerable groups","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted social support measures and interventions","Technologies":"Virtual platforms for communication and education","People":"At-risk and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Governments, NGOs"},{"Description":"Psychological effects of the COVID-19 epidemic","Impact":"Increase in stress, anxiety, and social isolation","Mitigation":"Establishing virtual communication and education platforms, providing psychological interventions, and focusing on high-risk groups","Technologies":"Virtual networking platforms, video conferences, and telecommunication","People":"General population, high-risk groups, patients with psychological disorders, older adults","Owner":"Governments, NGOs"}]}
